title: i need help choosing a cmputer
body:
can this laptop {{summoner:6}} league of legends ?  and if yes would i need to run it at lwo settings ?

MSI GS70 6QD-055NL - 17.3" (i7-6700HQ/8GB/ 256GB/965M)
procesor 	Intel Core i7-6700HQ 2.60 GHz
cache	6 MB
RAM	8 GB - DDR4 SDRAM - 2133 MHz
hardrive	256 GB - NVMe M.2 SSD
grafic card	NVIDIA GeForce GTX 965M
grafic card memory 2 GB GDDR5

replies.body:
That PC certainly destroys the minimum and recommended system requirements we have posted [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752654-Minimum-and-Recommended-System-Requirements/)

I can't say for sure what specific settings you will *for sure* run efficiently at, but since that's a relatively new graphics chipset and Processor, I suspect you may be able to run at max settings with little to no issue. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
What iv learnd the Rez should only effect fps good luck
